title: Custom Made Meals, LLC Recalls Bacon Wrapped Jalapeno Product Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Sep. 09, 2023 – Custom Made Meals, LLC, a Denver, Col. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,345 pounds of bacon wrapped jalapeno product due to misbranding and undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains...
